title: Flight Simulator 2020  -  How to - Change cockpit buttons behavior to prior Sim Update 5
description:
Prior to Sim Update 5 the buttons on the dashboards did not illuminate and buttons could be controlled pretty easy. With Sim Update 5 this has changed to ensure a universal method of controlling those buttons however currently not all community addons don't fully support this method and maybe you even liked the previous method even more ;-). In this video we will discuss how you can revert this configuration and control the buttons the "old" way.
